Production Co: Match Factory Productions, Palari Films, E&W Films, Phoenix Films (II), Bombero International
Synopsis: Ajo Kawir is a fighter who fears nothing, not even death. His raging urge to fight is driven by a secret: his impotence. When he crosses paths with a tough female fighter named Iteung, Ajo gets beaten black and blue, but he also falls head over heels in love. Will Ajo's path lead him to a happy life with Iteung, and, eventually, his own peace of mind?
Title: Vengeance Is Mine, All Others Pay Cash
